message.body: home! and I brought an orange back from Paris which cayce ended up needing for our drinks! he said it was the juiciest rind
Yay!! Glad you made it safe and sound. Paris oranges are alright.
such a long journey. can't wait to eat so many vegetables. is your toilet fixed?
ITS FIXED! I am so happy.
YAY!!!!!!! you must feel so much better
burn that bucket!
I am pretty stoked. I immediately took apart the bucket.
Perfect timing too. Things were starting to smell with the warm weather
Are the tinies happy to see you?
ugh. Cayce was asking me a bunch of questions about how it worked and I didn't know. so glad you'll be able to relax about that
yes! they are. so cute
frankie?
Lol. He doesn't need to know the nitemare that is a bucket toilet. She has been in my lap for hours!
So special!!!
sweet!! she's so happy.
yeah I realized I didn't ask all the details bc the bucket just seemed so terrible
It was. It really was. Are you exhausted?
so sorry you had to go through that, it's over! yes so tired and have a terrible headache. everything is bright
Oh noooo. Drink water and sit in the dark.
that sounds amazing
Hahaha. He's infiltrated! I started messing around cause you inspired me!!! I have 4 seconds of a pottero so far and it's really getting my brain going. Premiere is amazing for photoshop
What happened to you pot oil friend??
that's so great about eating habits! would love to help. and need to get going with premiere. don't have full details about pot oil friend but she made it thru the performance
cayce loves his apron!!
